data.quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.
data.author: Rabindranath Tagore

data.quote: Growth is painful. Change is painful. But, nothing is as painful as staying stuck where you do not belong.
data.author: N. R. Narayana Murthy

data.quote: I have always believed that process is more important than results.
data.author: MS Dhoni

data.quote: Life is a song - sing it. Life is a game - play it. Life is a challenge - meet it. Life is a dream - realize it. Life is a sacrifice - offer it. Life is love - enjoy it.
data.author: Sai Baba

data.quote: A value is valuable when the value of value is valuable to oneself.
data.author: Dayananda Saraswati

data.quote: All Birds find shelter during rain. But Eagle avoids rain by flying above clouds.
data.author: Dr APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: You cannot change your future, but, you can change your habits, and surely your habits will change your future
data.author: Dr APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: The best brains of the nations may be found on the last benches of the classrooms.
data.author: Dr APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to those who dream and work.
data.author: Dr APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Man needs difficulties in life because they are necessary to enjoy the success.
data.author: Dr APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: I don't believe in taking right decisions. I take decisions and then make them right.
data.author: Ratan Tata

data.quote: Take the stones people throw at you. And use them to build a monument.
data.author: Ratan Tata

data.quote: There are many things that, if I have to relive, maybe I will do it another way. But I would not like to look back and think what I have not been able to do.
data.author: Ratan Tata

data.quote: When people throw stones at you, you turn them into milestones.
data.author: Sachin Tendulkar
